title: PBE Update Frozen
body: On my PBE account I'm downloading the update in client and it has frozen at zero percent with an ETA of 0 minutes for about 40 minutes now. I had it going earlier when it froze at 81% for more than 40 minutes so I closed the client but when I restarted it hasn't moved past 0%. Stuck at "Applying Patches".

replies.body: Since you had the patcher going before, I'm hesitant to say that it's due to a spotty connection. This might have something to do with some of your firewall or other OS settings. Check out this [**patching guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#section-windows) and that should get your patcher running again. Let me know if you run into any other issues along the way!
